footer.description: HNV Solutions is the leading platform for streamlining property management tasks, from tenant communication to financial tracking.
footer.copyright_text: HNV Property Management Solutions. All Rights Reserved.

auth.login_prompt: Log in to your account to continue.
auth.smarter_management: A smarter way to manage properties.

about.title: About HNV Solutions
about.subtitle: We are dedicated to simplifying property management through innovative technology.
about.mission_statement: To provide user-friendly tools that empower property managers to achieve operational excellence, enhance tenant satisfaction, and maximize profitability.
about.vision_statement: To be the leading global platform for property management, recognized for our commitment to customer success and continuous innovation.
about.team_subtitle: The driving force behind our commitment to excellence and innovation.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions tailored for your property management needs.
services.tenant_management_desc: Efficiently track tenant information, lease agreements, and communication logs.
services.property_tracking_desc: Manage property details, maintenance schedules, and unit availability.
services.rent_collection_desc: Automate rent reminders, process online payments, and track financial records.

leadership.title: Meet Our Leadership
leadership.subtitle: The driving force behind our commitment to excellence and innovation.
leadership.founder_1_quote: Leading with vision to redefine property management through technology and customer-centric solutions.
leadership.founder_2_quote: Innovating at the forefront of tech to build robust and scalable platforms for our users.
leadership.coo_quote: Ensuring operational excellence and seamless service delivery for all our clients.

pricing.title: Choose The Plan That's Right For You
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing to help you grow. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing.disclaimer: Subscription and billing are managed securely through our payment partner.
